catalog_script_client.name: Select only future dates

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_ac744ce047b311109a45dac8536d435b
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Small Room (1-2 persons)">08ab8bcb472711109a45dac8536d43db</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:4fb89a80477fd1109a45dac8536d4339</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Select only future dates</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
	var bookedDate = g_form.getValue('day')
	
	var today_date = new Date();
	var today_date_str = formatDate(today_date, g_user_date_format);
	
	if (bookedDate <= today_date_str) {
		alert('You must book a future date.')
		g_form.clearValue('day');
	}
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>kim.lindgren</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-12-12 15:31:05</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>ac744ce047b311109a45dac8536d435b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Select only future dates</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Work Hub " source="x_950986_work_hub">4dc0b4a2472711109a45dac8536d4328</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Work Hub ">4dc0b4a2472711109a45dac8536d4328</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_ac744ce047b311109a45dac8536d435b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>kim.lindgren</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-12-12 15:50:51</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
